# uptimekuma_notification_gotify (Data Source)

Get Gotify notification information by ID or name

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "uptimekuma_notification_gotify" "example" {
  name = "Gotify Notifications"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
- `name` (String) Notification name
